reference.title: Error messages
reference.shortdesc: This topic defines all error messages generated by the DITA-OT.

section.p: Plug-ins may be used to add additional error messages into the toolkit; for more information, see the Developer reference section of the User Guide.

strow.stentry: Fatal

Invalid transformation type. Please provide the correct transformation type using Ant parameter 'transtype'. For example, valid transformation types include xhtml, eclipsehelp, pdf (or pdf2), tocjs, htmlhelp, javahelp, odt, eclipsecontent, troff, docbook, and wordrtf.
Fatal
Invalid input. This often means the input file is not specified correctly. Please ensure that the file name is entered correctly.
Fatal
Cannot find the user specified XSLT stylesheet '%1'. Please provide the correct stylesheet using Ant parameter 'args.xsl'.
Fatal
Invalid dita extension '%1'. Please input the correct dita extension using Ant parameter 'dita.extname'. Valid values are dita, .dita, xml, or .xml.
Warning
The Ant parameters 'dita.input' and 'dita.input.dirname' are deprecated. Please use the parameter 'args.input' instead.
Warning
Absolute paths on the local file system are not supported for the CSSPATH parameter. Please use a relative path or full URI instead.
Error
Cannot find the running-footer file "%1". Please ensure the correct file is specified using the Ant parameter 'args.ftr', and make sure there is no prefix of "file:" in the value.
Error
Cannot find the running-header file "%1". Please ensure the correct file is specified using the Ant parameter 'args.hdr', and make sure there is no prefix of "file:" in the value.
Error
Cannot find the specified heading file "%1". Please ensure the correct file is specified using the Ant parameter 'args.hdf', and make sure there is no prefix of "file:" in the value.
Error
The FOP plug-in cannot be found in the default location. Please install the required plug-ins into the dir demo/fo/fop or configure the build file to support your local configuration.
Warning
Argument "%1" is deprecated. The argument is no longer supported in the toolkit.
Warning
Argument "%1" is deprecated. Please use the argument "%2" instead.
Fatal
Cannot find the user specified XSLT stylesheet '%1'. Please provide the correct stylesheet using the Ant parameter 'args.xsl.pdf'.
Warning

Ignoring index-see '%1' for '%2' because parent indexterm contains indexterm children. According to the DITA Specification, the index-see element should be ignored if the parent indexterm contains other indexterm children.
Warning

Ignoring index-see-also '%1' for '%2' because parent indexterm contains indexterm children. According to the DITA Specification, the index-see-also element should be ignored if the parent indexterm contains other indexterm children.
Fatal
Input file '%1' not found. The specified input file could not be found; ensure that file exists and that you have permission to access it.
Fatal
Input argument error: no ':' found in the parameter '%1'. Please add a colon character ':' between the name and value of the parameter '%1'. For detailed information, please refer to the User Guide.
Fatal
Unsupported parameter '%1'. Please refer to the DITA-OT User Guide for supported parameters.
Fatal
Parameter value cannot be null for the parameter '%1'. Please provide a value for the parameter '%1'.
Fatal
Cannot create temporary processing directory '%1'. Please ensure that you have permission to create the directory '%1'.
Fatal
Failed to create new instance for '%1'. Please ensure that '%1' exists and that you have permission to access it.
Fatal
Invalid value '%1' for attribute 'extparam' of AntInvoker. Please correct the call to AntInvoker when directly calling DITA-OT Java code from Ant; for example, extparam="maplinks=XXXX;other=YYYY".
Error
Duplicate condition in filter file for rule '%1'. Check to make sure that there are no duplicate rules specified.
Error
MapIndexReader is not used correctly. matchList is null. Please check the code to see whether method setMatch(String matchPattern) is called before read(String filename).
Error

Cannot overwrite file '%1' with file '%2'. The modified result may not be consumed by the following steps in the transform pipeline. Check to see whether the file is locked by some other application during the transformation process.
Error
Cannot find %1 in the extparam for index generation. Please specify %1 in the extparam attribute in your Ant call to the toolkit index sort.
Error
Failed to load the input file '%1' for index generation due the following exception; no index information will be generated. Please ensure '%1' exists and you have permission to access it.
Fatal

Failed to parse the input file '%1'. This may indicate that a plug-in for your document type is missing, or that the document is otherwise invalid. Please correct the input based on the following message from the XML parser:
Error

Failed to parse the referenced file '%1' due to the following exception. This may indicate that a plug-in for your document type is missing, or that the document is otherwise invalid. Please correct the input based on the following message from the XML parser:
Warning
Found an indexterm element with no content. Setting the term to ***. Please add content to the indexterm.
Fatal
Log directory cannot be null. Please specify the correct log directory using the Ant parameter 'args.logdir'.
Fatal
Failed to create log directory '%1'. Please specify the correct log directory using the Ant parameter 'args.logdir'.
Fatal
Failed to initialize log filename with input file. Please specify input file using the Ant parameter 'args.input'.
Informational
Log file '%1' was generated successfully at directory '%2'. You can find detailed messages from the transformation process in this log file.
Error
Failed to generate log file. Please correct any other errors and try the build again.
Warning
At least one plug-in in '%1' is required by plug-in '%2'. Plug-in '%2' cannot be loaded. Check and see whether all prerequisite plug-ins are installed in toolkit.
Warning

File '%1' was excluded from the 'dita.list' file since it is invalid and all its content has been filtered out by the ditaval file. Please check the file '%1' and the ditaval file to see if this is the intended result. You may want to try placing the filter conditions on any reference to this file to remove the reference itself.
Fatal

Failed to parse the input file '%1' because all of its content has been filtered out. Please check the input file '%1' and the ditaval file, and ensure that the input is valid. You may want to try placing the conditions on any reference to this file to remove the reference itself.
Error
Failed to get the specified image file '%1' for output generation. Check whether the image exists and was copied to output directory before the final step of output generation.
Warning
Extension name of picture file '%1' is not supported for the current output format. Please convert your picture to JPEG or GIF style.
Error
The input of topic merge cannot be found. Please check whether the input to the toolkit "topic merge" module uses an absolute path.
Error
The output of topic merge is null. Please check whether you are calling the toolkit "topic merge" module correctly.
Warning

The file '%1' contains space in its file name. This file might not be transformed properly. Some stages in the toolkit do not work well with spaces in the file name. Remove the space in the file name and restart the transformation.
Error

No format attribute was found on a file reference. If the target '%1'is a DITA file, set the format attribute to "dita". If it does not reference a DITA file, set the format attribute to an appropriate value.
Informational
No 'domains' attribute for '%1' element was found. Please add domains attribute definition in the related DTD or Schema file.
Informational
No 'class' attribute for '%1' element was found. Please add a class attribute definition in the related DTD or Schema file.
Informational

No specified rule for '%1' was found in the ditaval file. This value will use the default action, or a parent prop action if specified. To remove this message, you can specify a rule for '%1' in the ditaval file.
Error
An empty @href attribute is found in chunk processing. Please specify a value for the @href attribute, or remove it entirely.
Error
No valid content is found in topicref '%1' during chunk processing. Please specify an existing and valid topic in topicref.
Fatal

Failed to parse the input file '%1' (the content of the file is not valid). If the input file '%1' does not have a DOCTYPE declaration, please make sure that all class attributes are present in the file.
Fatal

The file "%1" referenced by "%2" is outside the scope of the input dita/map directory. If you want to lower the severity level, please use the Ant parameter 'outer.control', and set the value to "warn" or "quiet". Otherwise, move the referenced file "%1" into the input dita/map directory.
Warning

The file "%1" referenced by "%2" is outside the scope of the input dita/map directory. If you do not want to see the warning message, please use the Ant parameter 'outer.control', and set the value to "quiet". Otherwise, move the referenced file "%1" into the input dita/map directory.
Warning
The XML schema and DTD validation function of the parser is turned off. Please make sure the input is normalized DITA with class attributes included, otherwise it will not be processed correctly.
Error
The tag "%1" is specialized from non-predefined metadata. Please make sure that tag "%1" is specialized from some predefined metadata tag.
Error
There is no target specified for conref push action "pushafter". Found in file="%1", element="%2". Please add <elementname conref="pushtarget" conaction="mark"> before current element.
Error
There is no target specified for conref push action "replace". Found in file="%1", element="%2". Please add a valid target to the conref attribute on the current element.
Error
Invalid value "%1" is specified on a conref attribute. Please update the conref attribute with the correct reference. A valid reference should contain '#'.
Error
There is another conref push action "replace" specified for current target "%1". Please delete one of the duplicate "replace" actions.
Warning
There is no correct target "%1" in "%2" specified for the conref push action. Please make sure that the target exists and is not filtered out; also, make sure that the target type matches.
Warning
There is a redundant conref action "pushbefore". Found in file="%1", element="%2". Please make sure that "mark" and "pushbefore" occur in pairs.
Informational
The key "%1" is defined more than once in the same map file. The reference href="%2" is ignored. No response needed if the keys are defined as expected; this is informational only.
Warning
The key "%1" is defined more than once in the same map file. The reference href="%2" is ignored. Please make sure the key name is unique in a single map.
Error
Conkeyref="%1" can not be resolved because it does not contain a key or the key is not defined. Using the conref value as fall-back if it exists. Please make sure the key name does exist.
Informational
Unable to find key definition for keyref="%1", href may be used as fall-back if it exists. Please make sure the key name is correct.
Informational
Key definition "%1"="%2" in "%3" has been defined in another file, so it is ignored. Please make sure the key uses the expected value.
Warning
Attribute "%1" in element "%2" has been assigned a value of "%3" which does not comply with its subject scheme. The attribute value should be one of "%4" as defined in the subject scheme map.
Warning
The index-see reference '%1' was not found in the plug-in. Please make sure that the appropriate index entry is created or manually update the index.xml file.
Error
Unable to find target for coderef "%1". Check to make sure that the target is available. Found in file="%2", element="%3". Check to make sure the value in the href attribute is correct.
Error
Code reference charset "%1" not supported. Check to make sure the charset value in the format attribute is correct and supported.
Warning
Input file '%1' is not valid DITA file name. Please check the file '%1' to see if the file is a valid target. The extensions ".dita" or ".xml" are supported for DITA topics.
Warning
No string named '%1' was found for language '%2'. Using the default language '%3'. Add a mapping between default language and desired language for the string '%1'.
Warning
The title element or attribute in the ditamap is required for Eclipse output. Add a title element or attribute to the map element in the ditamap file.
Informational

The anchorref attribute should either reference another dita map or an Eclipse XML TOC file. The value '%1' does not reference either. Change the anchorref attribute to reference a dita map or Eclipse XML TOC file.
Informational

Found a navref element that does not reference anything. The navref element should either reference another dita map or an Eclipse XML file. Change the navref element to reference a dita map or Eclipse XML TOC file.
Error

Unable to find navigation title, using href instead: '%1'. If the topic is not accessible at build time, provide the navigation title in the map, and set the format or scope attributes to indicate why it is not accessible. Note: '%1' might have been modified to use default dita topic file extension '.dita' or '.xml'. Provide the navigation title in the map or topic files.
Error

Unknown file extension in href: '%1'. If this is a link to a non-DITA resource, set the format attribute to match the resource (for example, 'txt', 'pdf', or 'html'). If it's a link to a DITA resource, the file extension must be 'dita' or 'xml'. Set the format attribute and specify the format of the file if href link doesn't point to dita topic file. Otherwise, change the file extension to 'dita' or 'xml'.
Informational

Only DITA topics, HTML files, and images may be included in your compiled CHM file. The reference to "%1" will be ignored. To remove this message, you can set the toc="no" or processing-role="resource-only" attribute on your topicref.
Error
File '%1' does not exist. Be sure the file '%1' exists or change the href to reference an existing file. Note:'%1' might be changed to use standard dita topic file extension name '.dita' or '.xml'.
Warning
File '%1' does not exist. Be sure the file '%1' exists or change the href to reference an existing file. Note:'%1' might be changed to use standard dita topic file extension name '.dita' or '.xml'.
Warning
Could not retrieve a title from '%1'. Using '%2' instead. Add a title in the target topic file.
Error

Unable to find target for conref="%1". Check to make sure that the target element is available, and that it is a 'xxxx' element. Note:'%1' might be changed to use default dita topic file extension name '.dita' or '.xml'. Check to make sure the value in the conref attribute is correct.
Warning

There is more than one possible target for the reference conref="%1". Only the first will be used. Note:'%1' might be changed to use default dita topic file extension name '.dita' or '.xml'. Remove the duplicate id in the referenced file.
Warning

When you conref another topic or an item in another topic, the domains attribute of the target topic must be equal to or a subset of the current topic's domains attribute. Put your target under an appropriate domain. You can see the messages guide for more help.
Error

A element with a conref attribute indirectly includes itself, which is not possible. Please fix the target of the conref attribute. The conref attribute points to '%1'. Note:'%1' might be changed to use default dita topic file extension name '.dita' or '.xml'. Correct the circular conref reference.
Error
The conref value must provide the id of the target element you want to reuse. For example, mymap.ditamap#mytopicrefid. Ensure that the conref value includes the ID of the element to be reused.
Error

Incorrectly formed conref attribute: '%1', Make sure the syntax is correct and try again. Note:'%1' might be changed to use default dita topic file extension name '.dita' or '.xml'. Change the conref attribute to conform the correct syntax.
Warning

An href value appears to point to a DITA file, but the format attribute has inherited a value of "%1". If the target '%2'is a DITA file, set the format attribute to "dita". If it does not point to a DITA file, set the format attribute locally. Note:'%2' might be changed to use standard dita topic file extension name '.dita' or '.xml'. Directly set the format attribute to the correct value instead of inheriting from ancestor.
Error
Found a topic reference with an empty HREF attribute. The attribute should point to a file or other valid address. Remove the empty href link or put in some content.
Informational

The type attribute on a topicref element does not match the target topic. The type attribute was set to '%1', but the topicref points to a more specific '%2' topic. This may cause your links to sort incorrectly in the output. Note that the type attribute cascades in maps, so the value '%1' may come from an ancestor topicref. Check and make the type attribute on the topicref matches the actual type of topic.
Warning

The type attribute on a topicref element does not match the target topic. The type attribute was set to '%1', but the topicref points to a more specific '%2' topic. This may cause your links to sort incorrectly in the output. Note that the type attribute cascades in maps, so the value '%1' may come from an ancestor topicref. Check and make the type attribute on the topicref matches the actual type of topic.
Error

Missing navtitle attribute or element for: '%1'. When you set scope="peer" you must provide a local navigation title, since the target is not accessible at build time. Provide a local navigation title in the ditamap.
Error

Missing navtitle attribute or element for: '%1' When you set format to a non-DITA resource type, you must provide a local navigation title, since the target is not accessible to DITA-aware transforms. Provide a local navigation title in the ditamap.
Warning

Unable to retrieve navtitle from target: '%1'. Using linktext under topicmeta of this topicref instead of the navigation title. Make sure the topicref type matches the target, and that the file name and topic id are correct.
Warning
Unable to retrieve navtitle from target: '%1'. Make sure the topicref type matches the target, and that the file name and topic id are correct.
Error

Missing linktext and navtitle for: '%1'. When you set scope="peer" you must use the navtitle element or attribute, since the target is not accessible at build time. Provide a navtitle element or attribute for the topicref.
Error

Missing linktext and navtitle for: '%1'. When you set format to a non-DITA resource type, you must provide a navtitle element or attribute, since the target is not accessible to DITA-aware transforms. Provide a navtitle element or attribute for topicref.
Warning
Unable to retrieve linktext from target: '%1'. Using navtitle instead of linktext under topicmeta. Make sure the topicref type matches the target, and that the file name and topic id are correct.
Warning
Unable to retrieve linktext from target: '%1'. Make sure the topicref type matches the target, and that the file name and topic id are correct.
Error
Link or Xref must contain a valid href attribute. Add a valid href attribute for link or xref element.
Informational

The type attribute on a %1 element does not match the target %2. The type attribute was set to %3, but the %1 points to a more specific %4 element. This may cause your links to sort incorrectly in the output, and link text may not be properly retrieved. Note that the type attribute cascades in maps, so the value '%3' may come from an ancestor element. Ensure the type attribute matches the actual type of the target.
Warning

The type attribute on a %1 element does not match the target %2. The type attribute was set to %3, but the %1 points to a more specific %4 element. This may cause your links to sort incorrectly in the output, and link text may not be properly retrieved. Note that the type attribute cascades in maps, so the value '%3' may come from an ancestor element. Ensure the type attribute matches the actual type of the target.
Error

The file %1 is not available to resolve link information. Either the file could not be found, or a DITAVAL file was used to remove the file's contents. Be aware that the path information above may not match the link in your topic. Check to make sure the file exists and DITAVAL file isn't used to remove the contents of the file.
Error

Unable to retrieve link text from target: '%1'. Make sure the link type matches the target, the ids for topic and element are correct, and that the target has a title. If the target is not accessible at build time, or does not have a title, give the link text as content of the xref element.
Error
Unable to find the target to determine the list item number. Make sure the link type matches the target, and that the ids for topic and element are correct.
Error

You are cross-referencing a list item in an unordered list. The process could not automatically generate cross-reference text, since the list item is not numbered. You need to provide cross-reference text within the xref element, or you need to change the target to something the process can support. Using the id of the target as cross-reference text for now.
Error
Unable to find the target to determine the footnote number. Make sure the link type matches the target, and that the ids for topic and element are correct.
Error
Unable to find the dlentry target to determine the dlterm text. Make sure the link type matches the target, and that the ids for topic and element are correct.
Warning
Topic contains no title; using "***". Add a title to your topic.
Informational

The LONGDESCREF attribute on tag '%1' will be ignored. Accessibility needs to be handled another way. To make the object accessible, you may need to add text before or after the element. You may also be able to handle it with a <param> element inside the object.
Warning
Required cleanup area found. If the output is only used as a draft, you do not need to do anything. If you are producing production-level output, you should not use the /DRAFT option.
Informational
Draft comment area found. If the output is only used as a draft, you do not need to do anything. If you are producing production-level output, you should not use the /DRAFT option.
Warning

Found more than one title element in a section. Using the first one for the section's title. Make sure that the title you wish to appear as a title is the first one. Then remove other title elements, or change them to a more appropriate element. As a last resort you could simply make them bold phrases.
Informational

Flagging attribute found on '%1' attribute. Inline phrases cannot be flagged. If it is important to flag this piece of information, try placing a flag on the block element that contains your phrase. If you just want to have an image next to the image, you may place an image directly into the document.
Informational

The link to '%1' may appear more than once in '%2'. If you do not want two occurrences of a link to the same href, remove one of the links or define the same attributes on both link elements. Note that links generated from a <reltable> in a DITA Map will have the role attribute set to "friend".
Error
Area element has no cross-reference HREF attribute. The area requires a cross-reference with an HREF attribute. Add a href attribute to the xref element.
Warning

Area element contains a cross-reference that is missing link text. The area recommends a cross-reference that contains link text; either from the referenced topic's title, or from the content of the cross-reference. Because there was no cross-reference content, the HREF attribute value is being used. Add link text to the xref element.
Warning
Area shape should be: default, blank (no value), rect, circle, or poly. This value is not recognized: '%1'. It was passed as-is through to the area element in the XHTML. Correct the shape value.
Warning
Area coordinates are blank. Coordinate points for the shape need to be specified. Correct the coords value.
Informational

In order to include '%1' in your help file, you will need to recompile the CHM file locally. The automatically compiled CHM file will only contain formatted DITA files, not files that are already in HTML. For local HTML files, you will need to recompile your help project after all of your files have been returned. For external web sites, you can set the scope attribute to "external" to avoid this message. If you are linking to an actual HTML file that will not be available, it cannot be included in the project. You should set the toc attribute to "no" on your topicref element.
Informational
Topicref reference to non-dita files will be ignored in PDF or Word transformation. If you want to include these files in PDF or Word output, you may need to change them to dita format.
Warning
Cannot find id attribute in map element. Default id "org.sample.help.doc" is used for Eclipse plug-in. If you want to use your own id, please specify it in the id attribute of the map.
Warning

The %1 to '%2' with @format='%3' can not be recognized, output it without creating a hyperlink. Set @format='dita' for %1 to DITA topic, set @format='html' for HTML files, other format is not supported.
Warning
No string named '%1' was found. Using original value. Add a translation for the string '%1' in the default language, then add mapping between default language and other languages for it.
Error
A element that references another map indirectly includes itself, which is not possible. Please fix the target of the mapref. The map reference points to '%1'. Resolve the circular map reference.
Warning
Conflict text style is applied on the current element. Please check ditaval and dita source to make sure there is no style conflict on the element which needs to be flagged.
Warning

Customized stylesheet uses deprecated template "flagit". The DITA 1.1 conditional processing won't be supported. Please update your customized code to use template "start-flagit" instead of deprecated template "flagit".
Warning

The file '%1' is not available to resolve link information. Possible causes are: the file could not be found; a DITAVAL file was used to remove the file's contents; the file is located outside of the input directory. Be aware that the path information above may not match the link in your topic. Check to make sure the file exists and that a DITAVAL file isn't used to remove the contents of the file. Also, ensure the file exists within the input directory, or else turn off the ant parameter "onlytopic.in.map".
Warning

The link or cross reference target '%1' cannot be found; this may cause errors when the processor tries to create the link or cross reference in output. Make sure the referenced ids for topic and element are correct.
Warning

No glossary id was found to be associated with key '%1'. Appropriate forms will be guessed from glossary entry contents by application contexts. Specify the glossary id when referring to a glossary in glossentry tag.
Informational
No language specification was found when referring to a glossary, falling back to default language 'en'. Specify language preference when referring to a glossary.
Warning

Key '%1' was used in an abbreviated-form element, but the key is not associated with a glossary entry. Abbreviated-form should ONLY be used to reference to a glossary entry. Correct the keyref attribute in abbreviated-form to reference a glossary entry or use other appropriate tags referencing non-glossentry term.
Warning

ID '%1' was used in topicref tag but did not reference a topic element. The href attribute on a topicref element should only reference topic level elements. Correct the ID '%1' and make sure that it references a topic level element.
Informational
It appears that this document uses constraints, but the conref processor cannot validate that the target of a conref is valid. To enable constraint checking, please upgrade to an XSLT 2.0 processor.
Warning
It appears that dita file '%1' is not referenced by a topicref tag in the ditamap file. Please make sure that '%1' is referenced in the ditamap file.
Warning

The copy-to attribute [copy-to="%1"] uses the name of a file that already exists, so this attribute is ignored. Please make sure copy-to attribute uses a file name that does not exist in your project.
Warning
The copy-to attribute [href="%1" copy-to="%2"] points to another copy-to target, so this attribute is ignored. Please make sure that this attribute value is unique within your project.
Warning
Template "%1" is deprecated. Remove references to this template from your custom XSLT or Plug-ins.
Error
Index entry '%1' is dropped, because corresponding group is not found.
Error
Build stopped. Problems occured during Index preprocess task. Please check the messages above.
Warning
There is no index entry found which closing range for ID="%1".
Warning
There are multiple index entry found which is opening range for ID="%1" but there is only one which close it or ranges are overlapping.
Warning
There are multiple index entry found which closing range for ID="%1".
Fatal
Empty href was specified for some topic reference. Please correct your ditamap or bookmap file.
Fatal
Topic reference (href : %1) not found. Reference may be incorrect. Please correct your ditamap or bookmap file.
Error
Number of columns must be specified.
Warning
There is no index entry found which opening range for ID="%1".
Warning
Font definition not found for the logical name or alias '%1'.
Error
Attribute set reflection can't handle XSLT element %1.
Warning
Index generation is not supported in FOP.
Error
Both index-see and %1 defined for index entry '%2'. Recovering by treating the index-see as an index-see-also.
